title: Ravengard's Scourger
content:
gard's Scourger Location & Where to Find

Location: In High Security Vault n5 in The Counting House.

Ravengard's Scourger Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Rare Value: 310 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg.
